Parameters.Name: RECORDING-4-1-14 RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: fault
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends correct fault

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: incorrect fault
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends fault with incorrect subcode

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Incorrect response: no fault
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT doesn't send fault

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: No response
Test.Description: Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends no response

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs (Receiver service is supported, DynamicRecording=true)
Test.Description: 1. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.02" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test 2. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.03" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends correct response with no recording jobs

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs (Receiver service is supported, DynamicRecording=false)
Test.Description: 1. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.02" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test 2. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.03" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends correct response with no recordings and no recording jobs

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs (Receiver service is not supported, DynamicRecording=true)
Test.Description: Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.01" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends correct response with no recording jobs

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs (Receiver service is not supported, DynamicRecording=false)
Test.Description: Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.01" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends correct response with no recordings and no recording jobs

Test.TestName: RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN
Test.Name: Correct response: no recording jobs (Receiver service is supported, DynamicRecording=true)
Test.Description: 1. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.02" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test 2. Refresh features with Feature ID = "Features.03" from TestSuites\Recording Control\Recording\Features.xml and run test Check RECORDING-4-1-14 GET RECORDING JOB STATE WITH INVALID TOKEN test when DUT sends correct response with no recording jobs
